name: Phil F. Chan
content: Philip Chan Philip Chan Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences Florida Institute of Technology 150 W. University Blvd. Melbourne, FL 32901-6975 Office: 209 Harris Center for Science and Engineering Phone: (321) 674-7280; Fax: (321) 674-7046 Office Hours: MW 1-3pm (Fall 2025) This page is under construction and will always be... Lending a hand to the disaster relief efforts: Lists at American Institute of Philanthropy, Charity Navigator Research My main research interests are in machine learning, data mining, and distributed computing. My previous life... Publications and Citations Laboratory for Learning Research (LLR) [Want to build interesting stuff? Want a challenge?
